restlib

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • restlib.Request
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RequestWrapper

    @Immutable
public abstract class Request
extends Object
    Object representation of an HTTP Request. Implementations must be immutable or effectively immutable.

      abstract Optional<ChallengeMessage> authorizationCredentials()
      Returns the client's authorization credentials.

      Returns a new RequestBuilder instance.

      Returns a ListMultimap containing any non-standard headers.

      Returns the request entity as an object if available.

      Returns the set of client Expectations.

      Returns the from email address of the request.

      Returns the maximum number of times this request may be forwarded, if specified.

    • Method Detail

      • builder

        public static RequestBuilder builder()
        Returns a new RequestBuilder instance.

      • parse

        public static Request parse(String uriScheme,
            Method method,
            Uri requestTarget,
            Iterable<? extends Map.Entry<Header,String>> headers)
        Parses a Request from the String representation of its components.
        Parameters:
        uriScheme - the URI scheme of the request. Usually http or https.
        methodName - the request method name from the request line.
        requestTarget - the request target from the request line.
        headers - an Iterable of the header field name/value pairs.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if any argument is null. Also if any entry in headers is null or contains null key/values.

      • parse

        public static Request parse(String uriScheme,
            String method,
            String requestTarget,
            Iterable<? extends Map.Entry<String,String>> headers)
        Parses a Request from the String representation of its components.
        Parameters:
        uriScheme - the URI scheme of the request. Usually http or https.
        methodName - the request method name from the request line.
        requestTarget - the request target from the request line.
        headers - an Iterable of the header field name/value pairs.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if any argument is null. Also if any entry in headers is null or contains null key/values.
